name: TripeaksDreamland VR
description:
Tripeaks Solitaire card game with beautiful graphics in VR!

features:
- Full Oculus Quest Controller support
- Three difficulties
- Smooth graphics
- Online high scores
- 150 levels with different layouts
- 5 languages selectable (English, German, Spanish, Turkish, Polish)
- Use your own MP3 Files on the Quest during a session

Copy Mp3 Files to the Music Folder on your Quest under "/Music/tripeaks".

Thumbsticks are used for Audio Controls:
Press = Start/Stop
Up = Volume Up
Down = Volume Down
Right = Next
Left = Previous

Also available for the Oculus Go:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/go/2351409044933732

and Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.DannyDan.TripeaksDL
